assignments.description: Assign fields specific to the Field type. * Label (over-rides standard)
assignments.name: A_Assign_Field_Specific_Fields
assignments.label: Assign Field-Specific Fields

fields.name: IC_Use_Advanced_Ordering
fields.helpText:
Use when you need to order by multiple fields.


ï»¿Advanced Ordering removes the simple field picker and allows you to enter a SOQL-style ORDER BY clause.

value.stringValue: Select the field to order by. Use Advanced Ordering if you need to order by more than one field.
Background color for the overall Tile Wall component

fields.name: IP_Tile_Heights
fields.helpText:
Sets the height of the tiles in the Tile Wall.


Max-Row: Every tile in a row will be the height of the tallest tile in that row;

Fixed: Fixed at specified height;

Individual: Each tile sized to fit content.

value.stringValue: Select the field that will be used as the title for the tile.

fields.name: IP_Title_Size
fields.helpText:
Text size style for the title.

Google slds text for examples of each style.

fields.name: IP_Media_Format
fields.helpText: Whether to attempt to crop the media into a circle. This only works well for square images, or for icons.

value.stringValue: Select the field that contains the icon name or image Url for this tile
Background color for each individual tile. 6-character HEX format (eg #FFFFFF) MUST be used if opacity is specified.
API Name of a record field that provides the background color for the tile, eg. through a formula. 6-char HEX format (eg #FFFFFF) MUST be used by this field if opacity is specified.

API Name of a record field that provides the URL for that tile's background, eg. through a formula field. Make sure the site hosting the image is added to CSP Trusted Sites if this component is used in Experience Cloud.

fields.name: DT_Field_Heading
fields.fieldText: Field & Badge Configuration:

fields.name: IP_Field_Label_Style
fields.helpText:
Stacked: Field labels are displayed above the field values

Horizontal: Field labels are displayed to the left of the field values

fields.name: DT_Config_Fail_Intro
fields.fieldText: The configuration record couldn't be created. Was the name unique?

fields.name: DT_CreateEdit_Field_Intro
fields.fieldText: Enter the details about the field, badge, or action:

fields.name: IT_Label
fields.helpText: Optional label for this field. If omitted, the value will take up the full space.

fields.name: IP_Field_Text_Size
fields.helpText:
Text size style for the title.

Google slds text for examples of each style.

value.stringValue: Select a field that specifies the icon for the badge.
Select a field - a formula field works well - that stores the hex (eg. #FFFFFF) text colour value for this field/badge.
Select a field - a formula field works well - that stores the hex (eg. #FFFFFF) background colour value for this field/badge.

fields.name: DT_Labels_Intro_Field
fields.fieldText: Label Text & Background Colours:

value.stringValue: Select a field - a formula field works well - that stores the hex (eg. #FFFFFF) text colour value for this label.
Select a field - a formula field works well - that stores the hex (eg. #FFFFFF) background colour value for this label.

fields.name: DT_Action_Intro
fields.fieldText: Action Flow Details:

value.stringValue: Reference to a Boolean field (eg. Formula, Checkbox) that determines whether this action should be displayed on a tile or not.

fields.name: DT_Error_Text
fields.fieldText:
Uh Oh! Something's gone wrong.


Could this Field have the same name as another one?

fields.name: DT_New_Config_Intro
fields.fieldText: Enter the required details for your new configuration:

fields.name: DT_Warning
fields.fieldText: The Configuration Name must be unique or there will be an error.

fields.name: DT_Intro
fields.fieldText: Use this configurator to create a new Tile Wall configuration, or to modify an existing one.

fields.name: DT_Select_Configuration_Intro
fields.fieldText: Select from your existing configurations or create a new one:
